parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'ExecRequests'
| where ResourceId == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| distinct Resource

parameters.name: LogicalServerName
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'ExecRequests'
| where ResourceId == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| distinct LogicalServerName_s

content.query:
let databaseName = '{DatabaseName}';
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databaseName
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=any(SessionId_s),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId_s),
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t),
    Command=any(Command_s),
    Status=min(Status_s), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass_s)
    by RequestId_s
| summarize ElapsedTime_min=bin(anyif(((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m),Start_Time > ago(30d)),1),
    Session_ID=any(Session_ID), 
    Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,
    Start_Time=any(Start_Time), 
    End_Time=any(End_Time),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=any(Status),
    Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type)
    ,Resource_class=any(Resource_class) 
    by Request_ID
| where End_Time > ago(365d)
| summarize count() by Status, bin(End_Time,5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Query Completion Count by End Time - 5m buckets

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == '{LogicalServerName}'
    //| where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
    | where statement_s != 'select @@version'
    | where statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
    | summarize sum(affected_rows_d) by bin(TimeGenerated,1h)

content.title: Adaptive Cache Used vs Hit Percentage

content.query:
let databaseName = '{DatabaseName}';
//Weighted query steps
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource == databaseName
| where RowCount_d > 0
| summarize sum(RowCount_d) by RequestId_s, OperationType_s
| order by sum_RowCount_d desc
| limit 20
| render columnchart
content.title: 20 Largest Query Steps by Most Rows Moved

content.query:
let databaseName = '{DatabaseName}';
//Weighted query steps
let RequestSteps = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource == databaseName
| where RowCount_d > 100000000
| extend Step_Elapsed_Min = round((EndTime_t - StartTime_t)/1m, 2)
| extend Weighted_cnt = iff('{WeightParameter}'=='Weighted',(case(OperationType_s == 'BroadcastMoveOperation', (RowCount_d*20), RowCount_d)),RowCount_d)
| project-rename StepStatus = Status_s, StepStart = StartTime_t, StepEnd = EndTime_t//, StepResource = Resource
| top 100 by Weighted_cnt desc
| order by Weighted_cnt desc
| project Request_ID=RequestId_s,OperationType_s, RowCount_d,Weighted_cnt,Step_Elapsed_Min, StepStart, StepEnd, StepStatus, StepIndex_d,Resource;
RequestSteps | join (AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databaseName
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=any(SessionId_s),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId_s),
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t),
    Command=any(Command_s),
    Status=min(Status_s), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass_s)
    by RequestId_s
| summarize Session_ID=any(Session_ID), Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,Start_Time=any(Start_Time), End_Time=any(End_Time),Command=any(Command),Status=any(Status),Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type),Resource_class=any(Resource_class) by Request_ID
//| order by Step_Elapsed_Min desc
| extend Request_Elapsed_Min = round((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m, 2)
| project-rename ReqStatus = Status, ReqStart = Start_Time, ReqEnd = End_Time
) on Request_ID
| project-reorder Session_ID, Request_ID, Request_Elapsed_Min, ReqStart, ReqEnd, ReqStatus,StepIndex_d, OperationType_s, RowCount_d,Weighted_cnt,Step_Elapsed_Min, StepStart, StepEnd, StepStatus, Statement_Type, Command, Resource_class
| order by Weighted_cnt desc
| limit 20
content.title: 20 Largest Query Steps by Most Rows Moved

content.query:
let databaseName = '{DatabaseName}';
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databaseName
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=any(SessionId_s),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId_s),
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t),
    Command=any(Command_s),
    Status=min(Status_s), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass_s)
    by RequestId_s
| summarize ElapsedTime_min=bin(anyif(((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m),Start_Time > ago(30d)),1),
    Session_ID=any(Session_ID), 
    Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,
    Start_Time=any(Start_Time), 
    End_Time=any(End_Time),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=any(Status),
    Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type)
    ,Resource_class=any(Resource_class) 
    by Request_ID
| where Request_ID == '{RequestID}'
content.title: Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to view details

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestID}' //Put your QueryID here
| where Status_s != 'Running'
| summarize max(StartTime_t),max(EndTime_t),max(RequestId_s),max(OperationType_s),max(RowCount_d),max(Command_s),max(Status_s) by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc
content.title: Query Plan
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to view the plan

content.json:
## Search Criteria
Use the following fields to search either using a query text snippet or using a Request ID. If using a query text snippet, try to keep it as simple as possible becuase minor changes in formatting may cause your queries not to show up in the results. It's best to pick something like a table name, then choose the proper query from the list that will populate.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize 
    Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
    Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Command=max(Command_s), 
    Last_Status=min(Status_s),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
    by RequestId_s
| where Command has '{QueryTextSnippet}'
and RequestId_s has '{RequestIdSearch}'
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
| order by elapsedTime_sec
| summarize 
    Executions = count(),
    Max_Elapsed_Time_sec = bin(max(elapsedTime_sec),1),
    Min_Elapsed_Time_sec = bin(min(elapsedTime_sec),1),
    Variability_sec=bin((max(elapsedTime_sec)-min(elapsedTime_sec)),1),
    SampleQID = any(RequestId_s)
    by Command
| order by Max_Elapsed_Time_sec
content.title: Matching Queries

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where RequestId_s == '{SampleQID}'
| summarize 
    Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
    Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Command=max(Command_s), 
    Last_Status=min(Status_s),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
    by RequestId_s
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
| join kind=inner
    (AzureDiagnostics 
    | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
    | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
    | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | summarize 
        Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
        Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
        Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
        Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
        End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
        End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
        Command=max(Command_s), 
        Last_Status=min(Status_s),
        Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
        Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
        by RequestId_s
    | extend elapsedTime_sec = (End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
    | extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
    | extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
    )
on Command 
| project Request_ID1,Session_ID1,Submit_Time1,Start_Time1,End_Compile_Time1,End_Time1,Last_Status1,Statement_Type1,Resource_class1,elapsedTime_sec1,CompileTime_sec1
content.title: All Executions of Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see individual executions

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestId}'
//| where Status_s != 'Running'
| summarize max(StartTime_t),max(EndTime_t),max(RequestId_s),max(OperationType_s),max(RowCount_d),max(Command_s),max(Status_s) by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc
content.title: Query Plan for Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a Query Above to See the Query Plan

content.json: All Charts on this page are based on the last 7 days of data

content.query:
//Build cache count by day
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
| where Command_s != ""
| where ResourceClass_s != ""
| project Command_s,TimeGenerated,RequestId_s
| summarize LastRebuild=max(TimeGenerated),RebuildCount=count(RequestId_s) by Command_s
| order by RebuildCount desc
| limit 15
content.title: Top 15 Most Rebuilds by Table

content.query:
//Build cache count by day
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
| where Command_s == "{QueryText}"
| where ResourceClass_s != ""
| project Command_s,TimeGenerated,RequestId_s
| summarize count() by Command_s,bin(TimeGenerated,24h)
| limit 20
| render timechart
content.title: Rebuilds per Day for Selected Table
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see runs by day

content.query:
//Build cache count by day
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
| where Command_s != ""
| where ResourceClass_s != ""
| project Command_s,TimeGenerated,RequestId_s
| summarize count() by Command_s, bin(TimeGenerated,24h)
| where count_ > 7
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Rebuild Count by Table by Day

content.query:
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=max(SessionId_s),      Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),      Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),      Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),      End_Time=max(EndTime_t),      Command=max(Command_s),       Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),     Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s)      by RequestId_s
| join kind= inner
(
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
    | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
    //| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | where StatementType_s == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
    | where EndTime_t > ago(7d)
    | where StartTime_t > ago(7d)
    | extend elapsedTime_min = (EndTime_t - StartTime_t)/1m
    //| extend elapsedTime_min = elapsedTime/1m
    | order by elapsedTime_min desc
    | project Request_ID=RequestId_s,elapsedTime_min 
)
on Request_ID
| order by elapsedTime_min desc
| project Request_ID,Submit_Time,Start_Time,End_Time,Elapsed_Time=round(elapsedTime_min,1) ,Command
| limit 15
content.title: Top 15 Elapsed Time per Rebuild

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestId}'
| where Status_s != 'Running'
| summarize max(StartTime_t),max(EndTime_t),max(RequestId_s),max(OperationType_s),max(RowCount_d),max(Command_s),max(Status_s) by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc
content.title: Query Plan for Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to view plan

content.title: Workload Group Allocation By System Percent

parameters.name: WorkloadGroupName
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'ExecRequests'
 and ResourceClass_s != ""
| distinct ResourceClass_s

content.json:
## Select a Principal or Application name to filter results - leave to 'unset' to view all results
SQL Auditing must be enabled and sending to the same Log Analytics Workspace for this page to work.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: User to filter subsequent queries - leave to 'unset' for all users
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and LogicalServerName_s == '{LogicalServerName}'
| summarize by server_principal_name_s

parameters.name: Application
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and LogicalServerName_s == '{LogicalServerName}'
| summarize by application_name_s

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == "{LogicalServerName}"
| where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
| extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
| where statement_s != 'select @@version'
| where statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
| where server_principal_name_s has '{User}'
| where application_name_s has '{Application}'
| project server_principal_name_s, succeeded_s, event_time_t, LogicalServerName_s, duration_milliseconds_d, duration_seconds, affected_rows_d, statement_s, application_name_s
| summarize duration_seconds = round(sum(duration_seconds)) , query_count = count(statement_s) by EventDay = bin(event_time_t,1d), UserName = server_principal_name_s, Application = application_name_s 
| order by EventDay, duration_seconds desc
content.title: Query Summary for Selected User {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == "{LogicalServerName}"
| where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
| extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
| where statement_s != 'select @@version'
| where statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
| where server_principal_name_s has '{User}'
| where application_name_s has '{Application}'
| project server_principal_name_s, succeeded_s, event_time_t, LogicalServerName_s, duration_milliseconds_d, duration_seconds, affected_rows_d, statement_s, application_name_s
| summarize duration_seconds = round(sum(duration_seconds)) , query_count = count(statement_s) by EventDay = bin(event_time_t,1d), UserName = server_principal_name_s, Application = application_name_s 
| order by EventDay, duration_seconds desc
content.title: Query Summary for Selected User {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
let databasename='{DatabaseName}';
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databasename
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=max(SessionId_s),  
    Query_Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Query_Start_Time=max(StartTime_t), 
    Query_End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Query_Text=max(Command_s), 
    Status=min(Status_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) ,
    Query_ElapsedTime_s=round((max(EndTime_t) - max(StartTime_t))/1s)
    by RequestId_s
| join kind = leftouter 
(
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
    | where Resource  == databasename
    | summarize num_steps=max(StepIndex_d), 
    max_step_rows=max(RowCount_d), 
    max_step_sec=max(EndTime_t-StartTime_t)/1s
    by RequestId_s
    ) on RequestId_s
| order by Query_Submit_Time
| project Session_ID,RequestId_s,Query_Submit_Time,Query_Start_Time,EventTime = Query_End_Time,num_steps,max_step_rows,max_step_sec,Query_ElapsedTime_s,Status,Query = Query_Text,Resource_class
| join kind = rightouter 
(
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
    | where statement_s != 'select @@version'
    | where statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
    | where server_principal_name_s has 'nicksalc'
   // | where application_name_s has '{Application}'
    | project DatabaseName= database_name_s, UserName= server_principal_name_s, EventTime= event_time_t, Host= host_name_s, duration_seconds = round(duration_seconds), statement_s, QuerySource = application_name_s , affected_rows_d
    | project-reorder DatabaseName, UserName, Host, EventTime, duration_seconds, statement_s, QuerySource
) on EventTime
    | order by affected_rows_d desc
| project Session_ID,RequestID=RequestId_s,Submit_time=Query_Submit_Time,Start_Time=Query_Start_Time,End_Time=EventTime,Status,Resource_class,UserName,Query_text=statement_s,Host,QuerySource,Affected_rows=affected_rows_d,num_steps,max_step_rows,max_step_sec,Total_Duration_s=duration_seconds
content.title: Queries {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
| extend Duration = round(duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0)
| extend TimeBin = case (datetime_part("Hour",TimeGenerated) in (6,7,8,9,10,11,12), "Morning_6-12", datetime_part("Hour",TimeGenerated) in (13,14,15,16,17,18), "Afternoon_12-18", "Overnight_18-6")
| where server_principal_name_s has '{User}'
| where application_name_s has '{Application}'
| summarize QueryDuration = sum(Duration) by EventTime = bin(event_time_t, 1d), TimeBin
content.title: Query Activity by time - sum(Duration) {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
let databasename='{DatabaseName}';
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databasename
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Session_ID=max(SessionId_s),  
    Query_Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Query_Start_Time=max(StartTime_t), 
    Query_End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Query_Text=max(Command_s), 
    Status=min(Status_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) ,
    Query_ElapsedTime_s=round((max(EndTime_t) - max(StartTime_t))/1s)
    by RequestId_s
| join kind = leftouter 
(
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
    | where Resource  == databasename
    | summarize num_steps=max(StepIndex_d), 
    max_step_rows=max(RowCount_d), 
    max_step_sec=max(EndTime_t-StartTime_t)/1s
    by RequestId_s
    ) on RequestId_s
| order by Query_Submit_Time
| project Session_ID,RequestId_s,Query_Submit_Time,Query_Start_Time,EventTime = Query_End_Time,num_steps,max_step_rows,max_step_sec,Query_ElapsedTime_s,Status,Query = Query_Text,Resource_class
| join kind = rightouter 
(
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' and  LogicalServerName_s == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
    | where statement_s != 'select @@version'
    | where statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
    | where server_principal_name_s has 'nicksalc'
   // | where application_name_s has '{Application}'
    | project DatabaseName= database_name_s, UserName= server_principal_name_s, EventTime= event_time_t, Host= host_name_s, duration_seconds = round(duration_seconds), statement_s, QuerySource = application_name_s , affected_rows_d
    | project-reorder DatabaseName, UserName, Host, EventTime, duration_seconds, statement_s, QuerySource
) on EventTime
    | order by affected_rows_d desc
| project Session_ID,RequestID=RequestId_s,Submit_time=Query_Submit_Time,Start_Time=Query_Start_Time,End_Time=EventTime,Status,Resource_class,UserName,Query_text=statement_s,Host,QuerySource,Affected_rows=affected_rows_d,num_steps,max_step_rows,max_step_sec,Total_Duration_s=duration_seconds
content.title: Affected Rows By Request ID

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
and RequestId_s == '{RequestId1}'
| summarize Session_ID=any(SessionId_s),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId_s),
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t),
    Command=any(Command_s),
    Status=min(Status_s), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass_s)
    by RequestId_s
| summarize Session_ID=any(Session_ID), Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,Start_Time=any(Start_Time), End_Time=any(End_Time),ElapsedTime_min=anyif((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m,Start_Time > ago(30d)),Command=any(Command),Status=any(Status),Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type),Resource_class=any(Resource_class) by Request_ID
| project Session_ID,Request_ID,ElapsedTime_min,Command,Resource_class,Submit_Time,Start_Time,End_Time,Statement_Type,Status

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
and RequestId_s == '{RequestId2}'
| summarize Session_ID=any(SessionId_s),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId_s),
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t),
    Command=any(Command_s),
    Status=min(Status_s), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass_s)
    by RequestId_s
| summarize Session_ID=any(Session_ID), Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,Start_Time=any(Start_Time), End_Time=any(End_Time),ElapsedTime_min=anyif((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m,Start_Time > ago(30d)),Command=any(Command),Status=any(Status),Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type),Resource_class=any(Resource_class) by Request_ID
| project Session_ID,Request_ID,ElapsedTime_min,Command,Resource_class,Submit_Time,Start_Time,End_Time,Statement_Type,Status

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestId1}'
| summarize StartTime=max(StartTime_t)
    ,EndTime=max(EndTime_t)
    ,RequestID=max(RequestId_s)
    ,Operation=max(OperationType_s)
    ,RowCount=max(RowCount_d)
    ,Command=max(Command_s)
    ,Status=max(Status_s)
     by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc
| project StartTime,EndTime,RequestID,Operation,RowCount,Command,Status,StepIndex_d

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestId2}'
| summarize StartTime=max(StartTime_t)
    ,EndTime=max(EndTime_t)
    ,RequestID=max(RequestId_s)
    ,Operation=max(OperationType_s)
    ,RowCount=max(RowCount_d)
    ,Command=max(Command_s)
    ,Status=max(Status_s)
     by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc
| project StartTime,EndTime,RequestID,Operation,RowCount,Command,Status,StepIndex_d
